StringTable.Label: Component_ECMAOE_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=PointDefenseIcon] 在效果范围内的盟军舰艇获得8点防御力。"

StringTable.Label: Component_Heal4AOE_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Hitpoints_Icon]在效果范围内的盟军舰艇每回合修复4点生命值。"

StringTable.Label: Component_Slow2AOE_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Moves_Icon] 效果范围内的敌方舰船将减少2个移动步数。"

StringTable.Label: Component_Skyfire_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=KineticAugmentIcon] 对整个舰队增加30%的动能攻击。[BR][ICON=ApprovalStatIcon] 对任何停驻此舰船的行星增加30%的制造能力。"

StringTable.Label: Component_HeartOfConquest_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] 对整个舰队的射线攻击增加30%。[BR][ICON=ApprovalStatIcon] 对任何停驻此舰的星球增加10%的赞同度。"

StringTable.Label: Component_Curiosity_Dec
StringTable.String: "在调查异常现象时，[ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] +1 研究。"

StringTable.Label: Component_ControlPerBattle_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Control_Icon] 每场战斗增加1点控制力。"

StringTable.Label: Component_HealPerBattle_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Hitpoints_Icon] 每场战斗后完全恢复健康。"

StringTable.Label: Component_InfluencePerBattle_Dec
StringTable.String: "每场战斗，[ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon]对每个核心世界增加+5影响力。"

StringTable.Label: Component_Perserverance_Dec
StringTable.String: "在任何停驻此舰船的星球，[ICON=ApprovalStatIcon] 可增加10%的赞同度。"

StringTable.Label: Component_EternalCity_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=ApprovalStatIcon] 对于任何停驻此船的星球+10%的赞同率。[BR][ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] 对于任何停驻此船的星球+30%的研究率。"

StringTable.Label: Component_Gaze_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] 对其舰队中的所有舰船增加25%的光束攻击。[BR][ICON=ShieldStrengthIcon] 对其舰队中的所有舰船增加5点护盾。"

StringTable.Label: Component_Scavenger_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] 有100%的机会捕获在战斗中被击败的船只。"

StringTable.Label: Component_Scavenger25_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] 有25%的几率捕获在战斗中被击败的船只。"

StringTable.Label: Tier0Mercenary00_Dec
StringTable.String: "雇佣兵用于制作模板时的放置。在完成版本中，玩家将看不见。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent04_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=CanSurveyIcon]勘测船[BR][ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon]每勘测一个异常现象获得25信用点。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent05_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=ImmuneToNebula] 对星云效应免疫[BR][ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] 被海盗忽视。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent08_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Mining_Icon] 对停靠舰船的矿业星基资源产量增加100%。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent09_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] 每回合对停驻船只所在的任何星际基地影响力+100%。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent10_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=AreaofEffectIcon] +3 对于任何星基的影响范围，只要舰船驻扎在那里。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent11_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=CanColonizeIcon] 可容纳更多的殖民者[BR][ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] 任何用这艘船建立的殖民地都能增加25%的制造能力。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent12_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=CanColonizeIcon]可以殖民水生，冰冻和贫瘠的极端世界。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent13_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=CanInvadeIcon]可以在战争年代之前入侵世界。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent14_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=StarbaseSupport] 建造了一个拥有5个免费模块的星际基地。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent15_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Raw_Productive_Icon] +5 原始产量增加到任何停驻舰船的星球。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent16_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +15%的制造业产量增长于任何停靠此船的星球。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent17_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] +5 研究点数，适用于舰船驻扎的任何行星。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent18_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=ApprovalStatIcon] +5 士气点数，可用于任何停靠该舰船的星球。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent19_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] 每回合为停驻的任何星球增加+5积分。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent20_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Military_Power_Icon] +75% 闪避[BR][ICON=KineticRangeIcon] 高质量驱动攻击。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent21_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Hitpoints_Icon] 拥有中型船只的生命值。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent22_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=BeamRangeIcon] +50% 射线范围[BR][ICON=ShieldStrengthIcon] 忽视75%的射线伤害。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent23_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] 忽视所有承受伤害的30%。[BR][ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] 强大的原型光束武器。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent24_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=MissileAugmentIcon] 强大的原型导弹。[BR][ICON=Stat_Handy_Icon] 在战斗结束时立即修复。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent25_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] 强大的原型射线武器。[BR][ICON=Shiprange_Icon] 长距离[BR][ICON=Moves_Icon] 原型超级驱动器。"

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent26_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] +50%的光束攻击，以及其舰队中的所有船只。[BR][ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] 高防御和命中点数。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent02_Dec
StringTable.String: "由于游戏机制的变化，旧模块已被移除。（留作占位符）"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent03_Dec
StringTable.String: "由于游戏机制的变化，旧模块已被移除。（留作占位符）"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent04_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=StarbaseSupport]构建时立即获得100点影响力。[BR][ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon]此后每轮影响力增加100%。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent05_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] 建立双倍正常产出的贸易路线。[BR][ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] 如果损坏，将在家乡世界重新生成。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent07_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=ApprovalStatIcon] 对任何停驻的星球增加100%的赞同度。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent08_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] 每回合在任何船只驻扎的星球上获得+5信用点。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent09_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] +5 研究点数，适用于飞船停驻的任何星球。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent10_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] 每轮对任何停驻舰船的行星影响力+100%。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent11_Dec
StringTable.String: "当飞船停驻在那里时，[ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] 对任何殖民地的基础影响力增加150点。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent12_Dec
StringTable.String: "每当[ICON=Malevolent_Icon]所在的船只或舰队赢得战斗，都会增加+1文化点。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent14_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=KineticAugmentIcon] 原型质量驱动器。[BR][ICON=Moves_Icon] 快速[BR][ICON=Shiprange_Icon] 极远的射程。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent18_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Moves_Icon] 使舰队中所有船只的移动速度增加50%。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent19_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=ShieldStrengthIcon] 舰队中的所有船只都将免费获得10点的护盾防御。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent20_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=AllWeaponsIcon] 对舰队中的所有武器增加30%的射程。[BR][ICON=AllWeaponsIcon] 对舰队中的所有武器增加30%的射速。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent21_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] 所有舰队中的船只增加30%的闪避率。[BR][ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] 所有舰队中的武器精度提高30%。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent22_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=KineticAttackIcon] 舰队中的所有船只可以忽视75%的质量驱动器伤害。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent23_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=StatTooltipBreakdown_Military_Icon] 对任何停驻舰船的星球的军事生产增加100%。"

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent24_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] +50% 舰队躲避率，并且每次在战斗中生存下来都可以回收250信用点。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent01_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=AreaofEffectIcon] 对任何停靠船只的星基效果区域增加100%。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent02_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=CanColonizeIcon] 将任何一个死亡的行星转变为16级宜居行星。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent03_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=AreaofEffectIcon] 立即翻转效果区域内的任何非首都行星。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent04_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] 对任何停驻飞船的星球增加25%的制造能力。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent05_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] +25% 对停驻舰船所在星球的研究。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent06_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] 每回合为停驻的任何星球提供额外25%的信用点数。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent07_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Raw_Productive_Icon] 对停驻船只所在的任何行星增加10%的原始产量。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent08_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] +250点基础影响力，并且任何停驻船只的行星每回合增加100%的影响力。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent09_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 4个突击无人机[BR][ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 4个护航无人机。[BR][ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 5个突击战斗机。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent10_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=KineticAugmentIcon] 强大的原型质量驱动器。[BR][ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] 高强度的各种防御。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent11_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] 强大的光束武器。[BR][ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] 只占用2个后勤点。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent12_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=MissileAugmentIcon] 强大的导弹武器。[BR][ICON=Shiprange_Icon] 长程[BR][ICON=Moves_Icon] 快速。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent14_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 6个护航无人机。[BR][ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 10个突击战斗机。[BR][ICON=JammingIcon] 对舰队中所有船只的50%闪避率。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent15_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=KineticAugmentIcon] 强大的质量驱动器。[BR][ICON=KineticRangeIcon] +100% 质量驱动器范围。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent16_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] 强大的光束武器。[BR][ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] 忽视75%的光束伤害。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent17_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] 对舰队所有防御+50%。[BR][ICON=JammingIcon] 75%闪避。[BR][ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] 快速"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent18_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=AllWeaponsIcon] 强大的原型武器。[BR][ICON=Shiprange_Icon] 长距离[BR][ICON=Moves_Icon] 快速。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent19_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Moves_Icon] +50% 移动速度适用于舰队中的所有船只。[BR][ICON=Shiprange_Icon] 整个舰队被赋予350格的范围。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent20_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] 对舰队的所有防御+10。[BR][ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] 忽视75%的所有伤害。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent21_Dec
StringTable.String: "[ICON=Stat_Ship_Maintenance_Icon]强大的质量驱动器。[BR][ICON=Stat_Ship_Maintenance_Icon]提升整个舰队的战略和战术修复能力。"

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent22_Dec
StringTable.String: "由于游戏机制的变更，旧模块已被移除。（留作占位符）"

StringTable.Label: Component_SuppressCrime_Dec
StringTable.String: "在这艘飞船的半径内的行星上，[ICON=CrimeIcon32] 减少了100%的犯罪率。"
